vote.title: Authorize a one-year service contract with two, one-year renewal options for Tenth Street home improvement rehabilitation services for the Department of Housing and Neighborhood Revitalization - Miko Trucking, Inc., most advantageous proposer of two - Not to exceed $749,549.10 - Financing:  Equity Revitalization Capital Fund
